translation.en: [ Man Narrating ] The future--
The polar ice caps have melted,
covering the earth with water.
Those who survived have adapted...
to a new world.
translation.ko: 살아남은 자들은 새로운 세계에 적응하게 된다

translation.en: Bad luck, English.
But the Slavers are producing a good grade of poxy these days.
Cost you a handful of dirt. Or maybe that wind chime.
- What are you doin' here? - Just waiting.
translation.ko: - 여기서 뭐 하는 거요? - 기다리고 있소

translation.en: Take your hand off the sail.
Take it off!
I've seen your boat before. Haven't seen you.
translation.ko: 배는 본 적 있지만 당신은 낯선걸

translation.en: Took it legal.
Previous owner was dead on the tiller when I found it.
You had another hour before I traded up again.
translation.ko: 형씨도 간 줄 알고 옮겨 타려 했지

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Just improving my means.
Well, I owe you then. No, thanks.
I got all the supplies I need. Just came from an atoll.
Eight days east, if you're interested.
- Two drifters meet, something needs to be exchanged. - I know the code.
translation.ko: 정보 값은 드려야죠 규칙은 그렇지만 공짜로 주지

translation.en: But I'll give you this one for free.
Nothing's free in Waterworld.
Smokers.
Just enough wind to get away clean.
[ Drifter ] Forget the bag.
It's not worth it. You'll never make it with your sails down.
What can I say? [ Laughing ]
- Joe, he's goin' for it. - What the hell?
Never seen that before.
Here we go! Go! Drive! Drive!
Faster! Faster! Whoo!
Come on! He's gonna get it! He's gonna get it!
Pick her up! Get it! Get it!
Inbound! Straight out from the gates.
English.
Flag's down, drifter. We got enough traders.
Dirt.
Open the gates!
[ Man ] Bones to berries. Veins to vine.
These tendon to trees. This blood to brine.
translation.ko: 힘줄은 나무로 피는 바닷물로! 늙은 이 여인을

translation.en: Too old she was.
This woman does leave us, recycled and enshrined...
in the presence of him who leads us.
- [ Boys Wincing ] - What is that?
You know me?
I know what you are.
Good. Then you know if you look for trouble while you're here,
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 사람인진 알죠 - 좋아 그럼 말썽 안 피우는 게

translation.en: you'll find more than you can handle.
You got two hours.
I'll only need one.
Me. You each get one...
if everything's here when I get back.
Pure dirt. [ People Murmuring ]
Three point two kilos.
How'd you come by so much of it?
Another atoll, 30 horizons west of here.
Where'd they get it?
They didn't say. [ Man ] We heard about that place--
heard they was all killed.
- That's why they didn't say. - Smokers?
Maybe Smokers, maybe Slavers.
So what's the word? We tradin' or not?
We'll tally it like, uh, pure hydro.
Works out to... 62 chits.
I want twice that.
I just want one sip of hydro. No, not till you tell me.
translation.ko: - 생수 한 모금만 줘요 - 얘기부터 해

translation.en: She got inkings on her back. I seen her.
They say if you read the marks on the child,
they'll lead ya all the way to Dryland.
Dryland's a myth. Some still believe.
They say the Smokers even got an eye out for her.
Well, then, we better keep it to ourselves.
- Help you? - Yeah.
Where's the store? You found it.
You don't have much.
You the man with the dirt?
Skoal.
- One more. - Make it two.
A man this rich will buy for a fellow outwater, I'm sure.
One.
That's an interesting pair of boots you got.
Trade? No.
Shame.
Enola. Hey, what are you doing?
No, you can't have it. I need another piece. I want to draw some more.
I'll get it to you. Just stay in the back.
translation.ko: 내가 갖다 줄 테니 가 있어

translation.en: With all those chits, you could order up a bath.
translation.ko: 내가 갖다 줄 테니 가 있어 형씨는 목욕도 할 만큼 부자잖아

translation.en: Have you ever had a freshwater bath?
translation.ko: 형씨는 목욕도 할 만큼 부자잖아 - 민물에서 목욕해 봤소? - 왜 자꾸 말을 걸지?

translation.en: Why are you talkin' to me? Just being friendly.
translation.ko: - 민물에서 목욕해 봤소? - 왜 자꾸 말을 걸지? 친해지려는 것뿐이오

translation.en: - Is that a tomato plant? - Yeah.
You have a keen eye.
translation.ko: - 저거 토마토 나무요? - 네 눈썰미가 있으시군요

translation.en: Saw one in a picture. How much?
Half your chits.
I'll take them too. Take what?
You bought everything. I'll take them shelves.
So, what did you see out there in your 15 months?
Such as? An end to all this water.
Askin' the wrong person.
translation.ko: - 예를 들면? - 망망대해의 끝요 그런 거 못 봤소

translation.en: The one they buried today? Uh-huh?
She found the only end there is.
I've got a proposition for you, Mariner.
I'm not staying. We're not asking you to. All we want is your seed.
translation.ko: 난 떠납니다 이 애에게 씨를 뿌려주시오

translation.en: We can look to our own for impregnation,
but too much of that sort of thing gets... undesirable.
When she's pregnant, you go on your way...
with all the supplies you need.
You don't have anything. You're dying.
No man stays out that long and turns down a woman.
He's hiding something. Maybe he's a Smoker spy.
When the elders say so, you can leave... and not before.
translation.ko: 원로회 허가가 있어야 뜰 수 있다

translation.en: Gills.
- Mutation! - He's a mutant!
Throw the nets!
By what right--
You pay me to keep the peace.
This isn't it.
- He has killed one of ours. - He was defending himself.
- He needs to be destroyed! - Kill him.
That may be-- Let's kill him.
but not here and not like this.
[ Boy ] What is it?
Open the gate.
Is it a map?
You'd tell me if you knew, wouldn't you, Enola? Mm-hmm.
- What are you drawing? - I don't know.
Helen, look. Look at the prodigal child's latest vision.
translation.ko: 헬렌, 이걸 봐 신동 화가의 최신작이야

translation.en: How soon before we can leave? [ Man ] Helen, I don't have any idea yet where we can go.
translation.ko: - 언제 떠나죠? - 아직 목적지도 파악 못 했는걸

translation.en: I haven't figured out the tattoo on her back.
I'm a stupid man. The answer's right there.
translation.ko: 해답은 바로 저기 있는데 내 능력 밖이야

translation.en: It's just beyond me.
Maybe he knows.
Oh, yes, I see. They are webbed.
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten digits. That's wonderful.
They tell me too that you have gills.
Isotropic gills. Are they merely vestigial or are they functional now?
translation.ko: 아가미도 있다던데 그 아가미, 기능은 하나?

translation.en: My name is Gregor. I've just come to pay you a little vi-- vi--
Oh, my God. [ Laughing ]
I'm sorry. I'm not laughing at you.
I'm excited. Your gills. They're functional.
translation.ko: 미안, 비웃는 게 아니야 어족 사피엔스

translation.en: Ichthyus sapien. You can breathe in the water.
How deep can you go?
Look, I'm only here because I want to learn more about you.
translation.ko: 자네에 대해 알고 싶어서 온 거네

translation.en: You don't like humans very much, do you?
I can't say that I blame you. But tell me--
translation.ko: 그럴 만도 하지 그 종족은 다 성질이 그런가?

translation.en: Are all of your kind as bad-tempered as you are?
- I have no "kind." - Oh, fish rot.
translation.ko: - 종족 같은 거 없소 - 말도 안 돼!

translation.en: I'd be surprised if there weren't others, and if there aren't,
there will be eventually.
Anyway, I've come here because I need to ask you a question.
translation.ko: 내가 온 건 물어볼 게 있어서네

translation.en: Where-- Where did your dirt come from?
Is it from Dryland?
Do you know what this is?
The ancients-- They did something terrible, didn't they?
To cause all this water. Hundreds-- Hundreds of years ago.
If I tell you, will you open this lock?
I haven't a key.
There's a mooring cleat down there. What?
Good as any key. A mooring cleat?
I won't hurt anyone. I'll just leave.
- I'll be right back. - [ Man ] Gregor!
What's your business there?
Move along! I'm not a brave man.
If you know anything about Dryland, please tell me. Please.
Don't let it die with you.
No, no, no, no. Stop!
[ Man ] Gregor! Move along!
[ Elder ] After considerable deliberation of the evidence at hand,
it is our decision that this mute-o... does, indeed, constitute a threat.
Therefore, in the interest of public safety,
he is hereby sentenced to be recycled...
in the customary fashion.
Proceed.
I'm sorry.
Bones to berries. Veins to vines.
His tendons to trees. His blood to brine.
Too strange for life, he was.
This mute-o now does leave us,
recycled and entombed,
in the presence of him who leads us.
Smokers! Dead out of the sun!
To your posts!
- Kill! - There!
We are safe behind these walls.
Aren't we? [ Man Shouts ]
- [ Indistinct Shouting ] - Let me out!
Let me out! I'll fight!
Give me the key to the city now.
Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Floor it! Floor it! Floor it!
Swab it! Swab it!
Goddamn! More ammo!
[ Smoker ] Break down the door!
We'll have this atoll in no time.
Crank it! Crank it!
Look!
Oh, no!
Keep that gas goin'! Fill 'em up!
- [ Gunfire ] - [ Gregor ] Helen, come quickly!
You're not supposed to go yet!
Infernal machine!
Gregor. Gregor, wait!
Helen, I tried. There was an accident. I can't make it stop. Hurry!
You can make it if you try. Run! Up the stairs. Run! Quickly!
- Wait! Wait! - I'll throw you a rope. Run quickly!
Throw the rope now. Run, Enola. Slow down! Wait!
Throw the rope. No! No! Wait!
- [ Enola ] Gregor, don't leave us! - Oh, no!
I'm sorry! It was an accident!
Helen! Enola! Helen, I'm sorry!
Shoot him. Shoot him.
If I let you out of here, you're taking us with you.
Sure.
Here. Get over here. Get down.
Hurry! Come on!
Get the gate.
[ Mariner ] Hurry up!
Kamikazes. Come on!
That made a hole.
Find her! Get the girl!
There!
Go get that guy! Go! Kill him!
Wow. Enola!
- [ Mariner ] You're too slow! - Run to the other side.
- [ Gunfire ] - Come on!
[ Shrieks ] Grab on! Hold on, hold on.
It's stuck! I can't make it through!
- Let her go! - [ Gunfire Continues ]
Just drop her!
Turn the wheel. The wheel! Turn it!
That! Come on. Push it.
I am! Hurry! Now pull!
Push it! Push it hard! Push it hard!
translation.ko: - 밀고 있어! - 빨리요 더 세게! 밀어요!

translation.en: Okay, okay! Now pull this! Pull this!
translation.ko: 더 세게! 밀어요! 빨리요! 이젠 이거!

translation.en: Pull! Pull it! Hurry!
- [ Gunfire ] - Enola, jump.
Jump. Look at me. Jump! Okay. Now!
Well, excuse me! Did I say anybody could leave before the battle was over?
translation.ko: 저건 뭐야? 전투도 안 끝났는데 웬 미꾸라지?

translation.en: Did I? No! No!
translation.ko: 전투도 안 끝났는데 웬 미꾸라지? 난 저런 꼴 못 봐! 없애!

translation.en: Well, do somethin'. I hate sails.
translation.ko: 난 저런 꼴 못 봐! 없애!

translation.en: Hey! Can you steer?
Can I trust you?
Answer me this, somebody. Why is that boat still firin'?
What's that cousin's name? Chuck.
- Hey, Chuck! - [ Smoker Leader ] He's pulling him right into us.
Maybe he doesn't answer to "Chuck." Call him "Charles." Charlie!
Stop him! Stop him!
Charles!
Adios, cousins.
She's here somewhere. Keep lookin'.
What you got? Couple of heartbeats over there. Aren't sayin' much.
translation.ko: 뭐야? 두 놈 잡았는데 말을 안 해요

translation.en: If you'll notice the arterial nature of the blood comin' from the hole in my head,
you can assume that we're all havin' a real lousy day.
So here it is-- I need to know about that tattooed girl.
First one that tells me lives.
- I saw a girl. I saw, I saw-- - It was-- Sh-She had a big tattoo on her. She had lots of--
You won. Start over.
I saw a girl. I'm not sure,
translation.ko: 꼬마를 봤어요 근데 작은 보트에 타고 있었어요

translation.en: but I think she got on a boat with three hulls.
The boat that cost me a thousand G's of go-juice? Yeah, the mute-o's boat.
translation.ko: 내 배를 폭파한 보트? 네, 돌연변이 보트요!

translation.en: - Mute-o? - Yeah. He got these slits here,
like-- [ Laughing ] like fish gills.
He wasn't really a man.
A fluke of evolution.
Oh, I'm sorry. A fluke of, uh--
- Evolution. - I know!
No! No, you said you wouldn't kill me! Did I say that?
translation.ko: 날 안 죽인댔잖소! 내가 그랬나? 증인 있어?

translation.en: - Witnesses, anybody, did I? - Yes, yes, yes! You said--
translation.ko: 내가 그랬나? 증인 있어? - 그렇게 말했어요! - 그래, 어쩌면

translation.en: You said it. Oh, I may have.
I may have.
We get to the 'Deez,
tank up that sky boat-- send it out on patrol.
We gotta keep an eye out... for that ichthy-freak.
You been there, haven't you?
Dryland?
You know where it is.
Yeah, I know where it is.
And, uh-- And we're going?
You and I are.
The kid we gotta pitch over the side.
- What? - My boat's tore up.
I'm takin' on water.
I'd be lucky to get half a hydro ration out of that.
You know-- I said I won't drink.
For 12 days?
No. It's better one of you dies now... than both of you die slow.
translation.ko: 천천히 둘 다 죽느니 하나라도 지금 죽는 게 낫지

translation.en: Wait. Wait.
We saved your life. We got you out.
No, you got me out so you could get out. We're even.
She can cook. She can fish.
translation.ko: 저 앤 요리도 해요 낚시도 하고요

translation.en: So can I. Then take my necklace. Take my necklace.
I got better ones below. No, look!
After what you went through back there on the atoll,
I can understand why you would want to.
But she's a child.
Is there something else then?
Enola! Go below.
Enola.
Yeah. You said so yourself.
Been out there a long time.
Couple hours ago, I was potential dirt to you.
We're not like that. You all are.
Know what I was really thinkin'?
translation.ko: 지금 생각을 말할까요? 둘 다 바다에 던지고 싶소

translation.en: Why I don't drop both of you in my wake right now.
You got nothin' I need.
You're taking us to Dryland.
Killing's a hard thing to do well.
- Believe me. I'm not the one to start on. - Both of us!
translation.ko: - 시작을 잘못 택했소 - 둘 다 데려가요!

translation.en: How long you plan to hold that on me?
As long as it takes.
Let me out! Let me out of here!
[ Indistinct Shouting ] Don't you touch my child!
Okay, now don't move, okay? There.
Oh. Oh, lookin' real good, yeah.
There. There.
All done.
translation.ko: 다 됐어요 거리 감각엔 문제가 있을지도 몰라요

translation.en: Now, there may be some small problem in depth perception.
Well, it better not screw up my short game.
translation.ko: 골프도 칠 수 있어야 할 텐데

translation.en: - Well? - [ Smokers ] Looks good. I like it. Yeah.
- I like it better than your real eye. - Much better.
What do you say, Toby? The truth. Looks like shit.
That's why I love children. No guile.
It does look like shit.
And it feels like cold shit.
Deacon? What--
I'm sorry. It-It's just that there's a problem in the pit. Maybe you should come.
translation.ko: 기름 탱크에 문제가 생겨 가보셔야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: - Let's drive. - [ Chattering ]
The pit. Don't bother with the scenic route.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰지 말고 곧장 탱크로 가자

translation.en: [ Deacon ] Drive!
Hey, it's drivin' better.
Get off!
All right, all right, all right. Okay, okay.
You guys are great. Bless all you cousins over there.
Keep up the good work. Growth is progress. Growth is progress.
Somebody! Hey, up there!
Take it off!
- Yes. - Your Deaconship.
Hello. Good morning. Or night,
whichever the case may be.
What is it? I'm a busy man. I thought you should know.
translation.ko: 뭐야? 난 바빠 이 거무죽죽한 기름이 정확히

translation.en: We're down to exactly...
four feet, nine inches of black stuff.
Thank you, sir.
- How many G's is that after refinin'? - Maybe three refuelers.
We'll burn through that in two lunars. Sweet Joe!
translation.ko: - 얼마나 쓸 양이지? - 3번요 2달 정도 쓸 양이죠 젠장, 왜 이리 엉망인지 누가 좀 말해봐

translation.en: Will somebody please tell me what's happened to this place?
translation.ko: 젠장, 왜 이리 엉망인지 누가 좀 말해봐

translation.en: We outgrowed it.
All right. The only thing that is important is the tattooed girl.
We don't spare any go-juice findin' her.
We don't waste it anywhere else. You cancel all those tractor pulls...
and all that stuff until later. You got it?
Dryland is the mother lode.
[ Laughing ] On your toes.
Excellent.
- Hi. - Move.
[ Helen ] Enola. Enola, come here.
Come on.
Enola, come over here.
What are ya doin'? Decorating your boat. It's ugly.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 짓이야? - 예쁘게 장식하는 거예요

translation.en: Where did you get this? From down below.
This is mine. You don't touch anything of mine.
I drew it for you. You don't draw on anything. You understand?
translation.ko: 아저씨를 위해 그렸어요 그리지 마, 알았어?

translation.en: This is my boat. I got it the way I like it.
You take up space, and you slow me down.
You know, she's just a little girl.
She doesn't know your rules. You wanna stay?
You teach her.
Enola, what'd I tell you?
You're not so tough. You know that?
How many people have you killed?
Ten? Twenty?
You talk a lot. I talk a lot 'cause you don't talk at all.
translation.ko: - 넌 말이 많아 - 아저씨가 말 안 하니까

translation.en: Now how many?
- Including little girls? - I'm not afraid of you.
translation.ko: - 꼬마 여자까지? - 난 아저씨 안 무서워요

translation.en: I told Helen you wouldn't be so ugly if you cut your hair.
In fact, you talk all the time.
It's like a storm when you're around. Enola.
Hey! What are you doing?
- [ Enola ] Helen! - [ Helen ] You bastard! She can't swim!
Help me! Helen!
translation.ko: - 살려줘요! - 망할 자식! 수영도 못하는데! 살려줘요!

translation.en: Helen, help me!
Hold on!
Look at me. Look at me. Look at me.
Oh, please, come back. Please.
Thanks. I swear, if you ever touch her again--
translation.ko: 고마워요 다시 한 번 애를 건드리면...

translation.en: You son of a bitch. Look at me.
You will go to bed that night, and you will never wake up.
Shut up. What?
[ Helen ] Smokers? Yeah.
Can't we outrun them?
[ Engine Humming ] Not with my sail down.
- What are you thinkin' about? - That's a nice touch.
That's them.
Don't hit the kid.
Coward!
Fuck!
No!
Cut it!
Come on! Come on!
[ Helen ] Oh, I'm really sorry.
I'm sorry. But you didn't give me much choice.
Oh, I know.
translation.ko: 나도 어떻게든 해야 했다고요 당신이 도망치니까

translation.en: But you ran away. I-- What?
translation.ko: 당신이 도망치니까 무슨 짓을... 안 돼요! 제발!

translation.en: What are you do-- No! Please, no! No!
Don't ever touch anything on my boat again.
translation.ko: 다시는 내 배에 손 대지 마시오!

translation.en: She said she was sorry!
That means you're supposed to say something back!
Did you say somethin'? [ Enola ] Mm-mmm.
[ Deacon ] The child-- Did he have the girl with him?
- [ Pilot ] Uh-huh. - Seems to me if we launch now,
translation.ko: 꼬마도 함께 있었나? 이쯤에서 놈들을 잡을 수 있어요

translation.en: we can cut him down just about here.
If he doesn't change course. Ah, it's not likely.
translation.ko: - 코스만 안 바꾼다면 - 안 바꿀 거야

translation.en: He's a wily one, that ichthy-demon.
Yeah, if he knows he's been spotted,
he'll expect us to expect him to change course,
which is exactly why he'll keep his heading.
The important question is-- where's he heading?
And does he know how precious his cargo is?
I say that he's headed here, and we take him here.
Drifter? Mm-hmm.
[ Shouting Continues ] [ Helen ] Are we gonna stop?
Look at the flag! His flag's up.
I thought you all stopped for each other.
Well, maybe he has some food!
Don't find many who follow the rules anymore.
Well, make it quick. What's your business?
Trade.
You got any resin?
[ Babbling ] You been outwater a long time, haven't you?
Must be jokin' me, man. Resin! You don't got enough.
How 'bout food?
translation.ko: 형씨 가진 거로 수지는 어림없어요 먹을 건 어때요?

translation.en: Could you say that again, please?
- How 'bout food? - Ah, yeah, food.
translation.ko: 먹을 거 있어요? 음식, 그거 좋죠

translation.en: Yeah, that'd be good, eh?
I haven't eaten in, well, you know, forever.
Which one of you two is a cook then? 'Cause I usually fall for the waitress. [ Chuckling ]
translation.ko: 누가 요리사요? 난 늘 종업원과 사랑에 빠졌죠

translation.en: Like you said, I don't have much.
Now listen, eh? Let's see. What do I have to do?
We can start with that wee orchard you got over there.
- [ Whooping ] - All right. Hold it there.
[ Mariner ] We can talk. [ Drifter ] Fair enough.
It's a nice rod, isn't it?
I like that rod. It's a nice rod. [ Babbles ]
Got yourself a wee harem goin' here now, do ya?
What you want for the women?
We're not for sale.
Not for sale? There's no such thing as not for sale.
Are they a pair or would you consider sellin' 'em separate? No.
Our business is done here unless you got some resin or sail you can part with.
I told you once already, I don't have it. I-I-I don't have it. Don't have it. Don't have it.
Haven't seen neither for trade in lunars now. Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
translation.ko: 수개월간 거래를 못 해봤소 잠깐 기다려요

translation.en: I do have somethin' that'll make you change your mind.
Somethin' that you can't pass on. [ Giggles ]
I took it off an Atoller refugee camp.
The life savings of the entire clan.
Paper. [ Babbles ]
It's paper. Have you ever seen paper? Look at it.
Smell it.
I been savin' it for a special trade.
Don't you do it.
You know, maybe I'm talkin' to the wrong person here.
Whose boat is this? Is it your boat or your boat?
No. No, it's his boat. But he doesn't own us.
Half an hour.
[ Mumbling, Babbling ] Out of his mind somethin' there.
I got two pages in here, man. I mean, I'd get half a dozen girls with this, you know.
translation.ko: 저 친구 미쳤구먼 이거면 수십 명 값은 된다니까

translation.en: Half an hour.
- You tradin' or not? - Don't.
Shut up.
Forty-five minutes with the wee one right there.
I like to do the talkin', if you know what I mean.
No!
Fair. Come, come, come, come, come!
No. My boat.
- Fair enough. Fair enough. Good, good, good. Aye. - Helen.
- Sit down. - Enola, just do as he says.
It's been a while for me now.
Guess it's been more than a while, actually.
I've only got half an hour. Half an hour, half an hour, half an hour--
[ Mumbles ] Great, great, great--
[ Gasps ] Ooh. You're so beautiful. Aye. Anyone ever told you that?
translation.ko: 너무 예쁘군 그런 말 못 들었나?

translation.en: Give me that. What are you doin'? It's just a game.
translation.ko: 칼 내놔! 뭐 하는 거야? 그냥 장난이야

translation.en: Oh, I, um-- I, uh-- We was just playin'.
The trade's off.
I changed my mind.
Well, um-- Well, you can't do that.
I mean, a deal's a deal, eh?
I just did. Hey!
She's mine. Aye. No. No, no. I own her. But-- No.
translation.ko: 이 여잔 내 거요 취소는 안 되지

translation.en: - Go on. - Get, get, get. Go, go, go. Good, good.
But don't go too far now. This won't take but a minute.
translation.ko: 너무 멀리는 가지 마 이따 갈게

translation.en: I hate this boat. I hate this boat!
translation.ko: 난 이 배가 싫어 이 배가 싫어!

translation.en: You bastard.
You-- You're pretty stingy for a man who's got everything, aren't ya now?
Where's me boat?
Where's me boat?
Help me to me boat.
Ow! Me boat.
You'd never catch anything with this. It's useless.
Look, I'm sorry. You were right about the pole.
You were right, but we have to eat.
Now I know you can hear me!
Now we can fish for ourselves. You show us what to do.
You must know how. Even you've gotta eat.
You just sit there.
Happy now?
You don't like my singing, do you?
Helen says you don't like my singing 'cause you can't sing.
- Ever try and listen? - To what?
The sound of the world.
- I don't hear anything. - That's because you're too loud,
translation.ko: 아무 소리 안 들려요 그건 네가 너무 시끄러워서야

translation.en: and you're movin' around all the time.
Try sittin' still.
Eyeball?
I wish I had feet like his.
Then maybe I could swim.
Enola.
[ Burps ] Sorry.
Never met a person couldn't swim before.
translation.ko: 수영 못 하는 사람 못 봤어

translation.en: I can't.
People said I was weird.
Maybe they were right.
Maybe they were right about you too.
Enola wanted to give you this.
And this.
She won't take it again.
You don't look much like her.
Well, I'm not her mother if that's what you're asking. You act like it.
translation.ko: 난 그 애 엄마가 아니에요 행동은 그렇던데

translation.en: What are those marks on her back?
Nothing. They're just fanciful things.
- Like what she draws? - She draws what she sees.
translation.ko: 그 애 그림처럼? 그 앤 거울처럼 뭐든 본 건 다 그려요

translation.en: She's like a mirror.
translation.ko: 그 앤 거울처럼 뭐든 본 건 다 그려요

translation.en: People on the atoll thought she was a--
Freak?
I just thought she was special.
I'm not givin' it to her. It's just--
A loan.
Yeah. I'm not givin' it to her.
Is Dryland beautiful?
You'll see.
Enola, what are you doing?
Those monsters'll kill her! No, they're asleep now.
Hands around my neck.
Let the water tell your arms and legs how to move.
We're goin' down. Hold your breath.
What is it? What is it?
The barter outpost.
You said we'd get to Dryland today.
Today. Tomorrow. What's it matter?
I need resin.
- What is that? - It's PortuGreek. Their own language.
translation.ko: 거래하겠소? - 어디 말이죠? - 포르투갈 그리스어 저들 언어요

translation.en: Or so I thought.
There's my girl. Yeah.
Howdy, darlin'. Come on in here now.
What's going on? Smokers.
What the hell?
He's spotted us. Sound it!
Sound it! Sound it! Sound it! Sound it!
[ Helen ] Enola!
Starboard side! Now.
Get in the chair.
Watch it. He's clearin' the net.
Go to the helm.
Get the centerboard! Centerboard?
What centerboard? I don't know what to do!
It's too late. Over here!
Gimme that rifle. Boy, if you wanna do somethin' right,
translation.ko: 그 총 줘봐 손수 처리하는 게 확실하지

translation.en: you've got to do it yourself.
I winged him. I say we load...
all the go-juice onto one boat and run the freak down.
You can't catch him in ten boats, and you wanna send just one?
translation.ko: 열 대로도 안 된 걸 한 대로?

translation.en: Well, I pray that you're jokin'.
Bring me the trackers.
He's hurt.
It's not what you think. They weren't after her.
- I saw what I saw. - What?
No more lies.
- [ Shrieks ] - What are the marks on her back?
People say it's the way to Dryland.
Dryland's a myth!
No. You said so yourself that you know where it is.
You did.
You're a fool to believe in something you've never seen before.
I've seen it. I've touched it! Dirt that was richer and darker than yours.
translation.ko: 만져본 적은 있어요 이놀라가 담겨 있던 바구니에 비옥한 흙이 있었다고요!

translation.en: It was in the basket we found Enola in!
translation.ko: 이놀라가 담겨 있던 바구니에 비옥한 흙이 있었다고요!

translation.en: It doesn't exist! Well, how can you be so sure?
Because I've sailed farther than most have dreamed, and I've never seen it.
But the things on your boat.
"Things on my boat" what?
There are things on your boat that nobody has ever seen!
What are these shells?
And that reflecting glass?
And th-the music box? That--
Well, if not from Dryland, then where? Wh-Where?
You wanna see Dryland?
You really wanna see it?
I'll take you to Dryland.
Get in.
Well, what about Enola? There's only air for one.
Get in the water. It'll be all right.
Don't touch anything.
Okay?
I didn't know.
All this time...
I didn't know.
Nobody does.
Can you get us outta here?
translation.ko: 빠져나갈 수 있어요? 가망은 충분히 있지

translation.en: I'd say there are two chances o' that.
- Hey! - No way and no how.
Shoulda bought me that drink. Come on!
This way. Come on!
Proper introductions first.
I'm the Deacon.
If you don't recall the face, perhaps it's 'cause I didn't always look like this.
Now-- [ Clears Throat ] I suspect she's somewhere real close.
So we can tear this boat apart lookin' for her,
but I'd rather somebody just tell me where she is.
And the first one that does that lives.
And the runner-up-- Well, actually, there are no runners-up.
Oh, sweet Joe, I love this part.
Choose 'em. One, two. Live or die.
You know, personally,
I'd rather shoot the sperm-of-the-devil here.
Huh? But you know somethin'?
I don't think you're gonna tell me, are ya?
translation.ko: 자기도 말 안 할 것 같은데?

translation.en: Huh? Too bad.
Come on, eh? What do you say?
She's not your kind.
You don't even have a kind.
If you say it, he'll still kill us both.
Let's not get ahead of ourselves. If you don't tell me,
translation.ko: 너무 앞서 나가진 말자고 말 안 하면

translation.en: I swear to Poseidon I will torch your boat.
Refresh my memory. What happens when neither one of 'em talks?
translation.ko: 둘 다 말 안 하면 어쩌지?

translation.en: Never happened before. Never happened before.
[ Sighs ] All right! If they won't tell us where she is, do 'em!
translation.ko: 말 안 하면 둘 다 죽여버려!

translation.en: Both of 'em! Just kill 'em now! [ Fires Gun ]
So gullible! Bring her here.
- Take and ye shall receive! - [ Helen ] No! Leave her!
translation.ko: - 주는 것이 받는 것이라! - 안 돼! 놔줘!

translation.en: So ends your daily sermonette! [ Laughing ]
All we gotta do is figure out this map.
translation.ko: 이제 해독만 하면 되겠군 뒤집어 봐

translation.en: Turn her upside down here, boys. Turn her up--
translation.ko: 이제 해독만 하면 되겠군 뒤집어 봐 - 와닿는 거 없냐? - 없어요

translation.en: Does that mean anything to you at all? No.
[ Deacon ] We'll figure it out back at the 'Deez.
Back at the 'Deez, boys.
Careful with her. Careful with her!
What about them? Do 'em both.
Torch the boat.
We have to go under!
No, I can't breathe like you!
translation.ko: 난 물 속에서 숨 못 쉬어요

translation.en: I'll breathe for both of us.
Helen, help! Helen! Helen!
My boat.
Enola.
What is this? Get those chains off her.
What are we, barbarians here?
Goodness gracious. Sakes alive.
Come on. Outta here, you big, nasty animal, you!
Rub-a-dub-dub. [ Chuckles ]
You wanna come over here and sit on my lap?
How 'bout a cigarette?
Nothin' like a good smoke if you miss your mom. Never too young to start.
translation.ko: 엄마 보고 싶을 땐 이게 최고야

translation.en: No. Well, I got somethin' right here I know you'd like.
Like to draw, don't you? Huh?
Now they're yours...
if you help me with just one problem, all right?
Now-- [ Clears Throat ] Now that tattoo on your back-- [ Clears Throat ]
I've been told that, uh-- that's actually a map?
It's the way to Dryland.
Now we're gettin' someplace.
Could you teach me how to read that?
Setback.
Well, have you ever heard any of your friends talk about it?
You know, like your mommy or your pet fish? Did he say anything?
translation.ko: 엄마나 물고기 인간이 아무 말 안 하든?

translation.en: You shouldn't make fun of him. He wouldn't like it.
Girl, I don't give a shit what he'd like. He took out my eye.
translation.ko: 알 게 뭐야 놈은 내 눈을 뽑았어

translation.en: And if I ever see him again,
I'm gonna cut open his head, and I'm gonna eat his brains!
You think he'd like that?
You can't kill him. He's even meaner than you are.
translation.ko: 아저씬 못 죽여요 아저씨가 훨씬 무서워요

translation.en: But he's not here. And he ain't comin'.
And no one's gonna save you.
He'll come for me. He will.
Then you better tell me what I wanna know,
or he can see what's left of you in a goddamn jar.
translation.ko: 빨리 말 안 하면 병조림으로 만들어 주겠어

translation.en: We're going to die here, aren't we?
Aren't we?
After the atoll,
when I offered myself to you,
why didn't you take me?
'Cause you didn't really want me.
Not really.
Have I been asleep long?
I was dreaming.
It's funny.
I always thought Dryland floated.
That it drifted with the wind. That's why it was so hard to find.
Why did you believe in it so much?
Because we weren't made for the sea.
Got hands... and feet.
We're supposed to walk.
I miss her sound.
Don't you?
[ Gregor ] Helen!
He-- No, no, no. Helen, up here. Above you!
- [ Chuckling ] - [ Helen ] Gregor!
Smart thinking to burn your boat.
Without the smoke, I never would have found you.
Who's that with you?
Ichthyus Sapien, is that really you?
I'll throw the rope down. You catch it. I'll help you climb up.
Helen. Where's Enola?
Smokers took her. They'd have me too if it weren't for him.
translation.ko: 무법자들이 잡아갔어요 이분 덕에 전 살았죠

translation.en: My friend, thank you. Very human of you.
Go grab your things quickly. Quickly. Come.
[ Gregor ] You see? Right down there.
There's several of us survivors. We'll just start over again.
[ Man ] You can't ask us to go get her.
[ Woman ] Enola's the reason we're in all this trouble.
translation.ko: 못 가요! - 화근이 그 애인데! - 우린 안 가요

translation.en: [ Woman #2 ] Forget it. We're not going.
translation.ko: - 화근이 그 애인데! - 우린 안 가요

translation.en: [ Helen ] They don't have any reason to kill her. They need to find Dryland just like we do.
translation.ko: 지도 때문에 애는 안 죽였을 거예요

translation.en: - Of course. - [ Helen ] If the mariner's willing to go, why not us?
translation.ko: - 맞아 - 이분도 간다는데 우린 안 가요?

translation.en: [ Woman ] If he wants to go, then let him!
[ Woman #2 ] We don't want you here! You or the girl!
Helen. The papers the mariner brought you--
It's the same language the tattoo is written in. They're numbers.
translation.ko: 문신에 쓰인 글과 같은 게 쓰여 있어 바로 숫자였어

translation.en: [ Man ] Gregor, you're as crazy as she is! [ Woman ] We can't stay here!
translation.ko: 바로 숫자였어 - 당신도 미쳤군요! - 여기 있을 수 없어요

translation.en: We're wasting valuable time. More Smokers will come. We need to be moving now.
translation.ko: 시간 낭비예요 무법자들이 오기 전에 떠나요!

translation.en: My friends, don't you see we need this child if we want to find Dryland?
I'm not goin'. Nobody is.
translation.ko: - 난 안 가 - 아무도 안 가

translation.en: [ Woman ] We've already seen their smoke on the horizon.
translation.ko: - 난 안 가 - 아무도 안 가 무법자들 연기를 봤어요

translation.en: Know what that is yet?
The numbers? Yes, I think I do.
It seems to be some ancient form of geographic location-- latitude, longitude.
translation.ko: 고대 지리학적 위치를 나타내는 위도와 경도래

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, though. The numbers, they seem to be backwards or something.
translation.ko: 위도와 경도래 뭔진 몰라도 숫자가 뒤로 쓰인 것 같아

translation.en: It's upside down. The world?
The poles have reversed themselves?
I've been mappin' the cities below.
The world wasn't created in a deluge. It was covered by it.
- [ Man ] That's blasphemy! - [ Helen ] No, it's true.
translation.ko: 신성 모독이야! 아니, 제 눈으로 봤어요! 물속에서요

translation.en: I've seen it with my own eyes. There is land. It's right under our keel.
None of it's dry anymore. Some is.
translation.ko: - 마른 땅은 없어요 - 있는 곳도 있소

translation.en: Enola's been there. I know that now. I saw what she drew.
translation.ko: 이놀라가 간 적 있어요 꼬마가 그린 걸 봤소

translation.en: So that's why he's going after Enola-- to find Dryland.
I don't care about Dryland.
This is ridiculous. Going after the Smokers? He doesn't even know which direction they came from.
translation.ko: 무법자들을 쫓아가다니 미쳤군 어디에서 왔는지도 모르면서

translation.en: [ Man ] I say let him go. [ Woman ] We're better off without them anyway!
If she's alive, I'll bring her back to you.
[ Woman ] Forget about the mute-o, Helen. If he brings her back here, they'll kill us all!
I can't stand it. We gotta go help him. I can't ask him to do this alone.
translation.ko: 우리도 도와야 해요 혼자선 안 돼요

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, my dear. You're not going to have to.
translation.ko: 걱정 마 혼자 싸우게는 안 해

translation.en: You got that tattoo figured out yet?
It would be easier if it was flat-- big and flat.
It needs to be flat. What you got in mind?
translation.ko: 차라리 평평하면 더 쉽겠어요 그럼 어쩌라고?

translation.en: Well, you cut it off her back. You stretch it, mount it.
translation.ko: 문신을 잘라서 평평하게 놓으면 잘 보일 것 같아요

translation.en: Give us a proper look. Take her down below until I holler.
translation.ko: 문신을 잘라서 평평하게 놓으면 잘 보일 것 같아요 부를 때까지 감시해

translation.en: Saint Joe, we're close.
After centuries of shame.
They're gettin' ugly. Don't I know it.
Announce me, cousin.
[ Microphone Popping ] Hey. Here he is.
Rise up, brothers and sisters.
Turn your eyes and open your hearts...
to your humble benefactor,
your spiritual shepherd and dictator for life,
the Deacon of the 'Deez.
Look out! It's mine! It's mine!
Children. Children of the provider.
Citizens of the good ship. Please now, hear me speak.
I've had a vision. [ Man ] Yeah, we're tired of your visions!
What about the land you promised us?
[ Deacon ] O ye of little faith.
I've had a vision so great...
that as it came to me, I wept.
- And in this splenditudinous figment of wonder, - Is that Bone's ride?
And you know what it is that I saw.
translation.ko: 나는 보았다 뭘 봤는지 알 것이다

translation.en: I saw... the land.
- Horse, that you? - [ Engine Revving ]
Look, just bring it in slow, okay? I don't have all day.
- [ Engine Revs ] - Horse!
Just bring it up slow.
I said slow! [ Screams ]
Shouldn't be doing that. You're gonna get in trouble.
Ha. That's right.
You're not afraid. You've got your pet freak comin' to rescue you.
translation.ko: 그렇겠지 괴물이 구해주러 온다고 겁이 없군

translation.en: He's not a freak, and he can take you anytime.
He's killed dozens of people, and he doesn't have any mercy or anything.
translation.ko: 수십 명이나 죽였다고요 자비심도 없어요 여자애들도 죽여요

translation.en: He even kills little girls.
Haven't we all?
Shit.
It's Horse.
Find him. Find him! Come on!
- [ Crowd Chanting ] - Yes! Yes! Yes!
Come on. Gettin' nervous, aren't you?
I don't get nervous.
[ Deacon ] And if there's a river, we'll dam it.
And if there's a tree, we'll ram it.
'Cause I'm talkin' progress here.
Yes, sir. I'm talkin' development.
[ Man ] Yeah! For we shall suck and savor...
the sweet flavor of Dryland.
[ Crowd Whistling ] [ Enola ] Face is all red.
Helen said with anybody that has a face that red,
he's either had too much sun or too much to drink.
All right, that's it. I'm gonna burn your face. Almost time.
translation.ko: - 더는 못 참아, 당장... - 시간 다 됐어!

translation.en: - [ Clanging ] What's up? - We're just talkin' about our friend.
[ Doctor ] What's his name? [ Enola ] He doesn't have a name.
So death can't find him.
Doesn't have a home or people to care for.
He's not afraid of anything, men least of all.
He's fast and strong like a big wind.
He can hear a hundred miles and see a hundred miles underwater.
translation.ko: 물속 수백 마일까지 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: [ Gagging ] He can hide in the shadow of the noon sun.
translation.ko: 물속 수백 마일까지 볼 수 있어요 햇살 그림자에 숨어 들어와

translation.en: He could be right behind you, and you won't even know it till you're dead!
Give it a rest.
He'll come for me. He will.
Well, I hope he does. [ Deacon ] The Lord's creation.
Remember you said that.
Look at us here today. [ Man ] Yeah!
Dryland is not just our destination,
- but it is our destiny! - [ Cheering, Whistling ]
Find him. Find him!
How can I find... this glorious place?
And he said to me--
"A child shall lead you."
A child.
- And behold! - It's time.
The instrument of our salvation!
[ Deacon ] Our guide in the wild.
[ Deacon ] Our beacon in the darkness.
Turn her around, Nord.
She has shown me the path!
And before the holy-most moment is upon us,
let's sacrifice one to old Saint Joe.
And let's get this tub of shit up to speed.
Pull!
Pull! Pull! - Pull. - Pull!
So which way we rowin'? I don't have a goddamn clue.
[ Laughs ] Don't worry.
They'll row for a month before they figure out I'm fakin' it.
translation.ko: 몇 달 동안은 모두 속을 거야

translation.en: But, um, wh-wh--
Oh, you want details. Well, I'm not tellin' these savages...
translation.ko: 자세히 알고 싶나? 아직 지도를 해독 못 했지만

translation.en: that we haven't solved the map yet.
I promised them results, and I'll get 'em if I gotta cut 'em out of her goddamn back.
Who is that? Who is that?
Maybe one of the spare rowers?
Why aren't you rowin'?
- It's him. - It is him.
You guys are in so much trouble.
Well, I'll be damned. It's the gentleman guppy.
You know, he's like a turd that won't flush.
I want the girl.
You know, I thought you were stupid, friend.
[ Gun Cocking ] But I underestimated you.
You are a total freakin' retard.
I want the girl. That's all.
Well, what on this screwed-up earth makes you think you're gonna get her?
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 건 아이뿐이다 어떻게 데려가겠단 망상을 하지?

translation.en: You know what this is?
I drop it, you burn.
We all burn. Now wait, wait, wait, wait.
[ Clears Throat ] Let's not do anything rash here.
I mean, uh, are you sure she's worth all this?
translation.ko: 무모한 행동은 말라고 그럴 가치가 있는 앤가?

translation.en: She never does stop talkin'. She never shuts up.
I noticed. What is it then?
Huh? It's the map.
translation.ko: - 알고 있다 - 그럼 뭐지? 지도 때문이군

translation.en: She's my friend.
Golly gee. A single tear rolls down my cheek.
I mean, you're gonna die for your friend.
If it comes to that.
- He's bluffing. I'll kill him. - He's not bluffing. He never bluffs.
translation.ko: - 허풍이에요, 제가 없애죠 - 아저씬 허풍 안 떨어요

translation.en: Shut up!
I don't-- I-I-- I don't think you're gonna drop that torch, my friend.
- Why not? - Because you're not crazy.
Oh, thank God.
Get him!
Let's go, goddamn it!
Don't just stand there! Kill somethin'!
Was this your big vision?
[ Yells ] I've always wanted to drive this monster.
There he is! There he is!
That's him! There!
[ Enola ] No! Let go!
[ Enola ] Let me go! Let go! [ Deacon ] Pilot!
- [ Deacon ] Pilot! - [ Enola ] Let me go!
[ Laughing ] You should've stayed underwater.
Now you know how to fly an airplane? You're lucky I do.
translation.ko: 비행기 조종할 줄 알아? 난 알아

translation.en: Ow! Now you stop it! You behave yourself now!
[ Helen ] It's going down. You can see it sinking. Gregor, bring us right down on top of it.
Hurry, Gregor! [ Gregor ] Don't worry.
Hurry.
Enola! Up here!
Grab on!
[ Gregor ] Are they on yet?
- [ Gregor ] What is it? - [ Helen ] I don't know!
Gotcha! I'm gonna rip your cute little lungs out.
translation.ko: 넌 못 가! 네 녀석 허파를 떼어 버리겠어!

translation.en: Pull! Almost.
Saint Joe. Hole in one.
- Helen! - [ Helen ] No! Enola! - [ Gregor ] Helen!
Oh. Oh, no! Quick! What are we gonna do?
Tie this off.
- [ Gregor ] Hurry! - Tie it!
- Got it! - [ Enola ] Ah!
Get 'em up now.
- [ Gregor ] Of course! North is south. - What?
- South is north. - I was swimming.
I saw. [ Gregor ] My friends.
My friends, look.
If I take a bearing from the sun and reverse the coordinates on Enola's back,
then Dryland is that way.
[ Helen Laughing ] It's fresh!
All of this! It's fresh!
I found something!
Maybe we should put them under the dirt.
I think it was their way.
[ Gregor ] They must have known they were dying.
I'm home.
Where's the mariner? He was outside.
Wait. Wait! I want to show you this.
First time in your life you got nothin' to say?
Enola, I have to go now.
But you came back for me.
I like you.
Why are you leaving?
I don't belong here. I belong out there. You belong here.
translation.ko: - 난 바다에 속한 사람이야 - 아니, 여기에 속해요

translation.en: It's too strange here. It doesn't move right.
Helen said that it's only land sickness.
We're all feeling it. It'll go away soon.
It's more than that.
